languages.text: "Хейнрикс, а какое правосудие ждет того, кто просмотрел предателя в лице собственного аколита?"
"Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, а какое правосудие ждет того, кто просмотрел предателя в лице собственного аколита?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits the one who overlooked a traitor in their own acolyte?"
"Heinrix, what punishment awaits the one who overlooked a traitor in their own acolyte?"
"Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"
"Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"
"Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

languages.text: “海因里希，若是有人识人不清，让叛徒当了侍仆，这样的上司应该受到怎样的惩罚？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: “海因里希，若是有人识人不清，让叛徒当了侍仆，这样的上司应该受到怎样的惩罚？”

languages.text: «Heinrix, ¿qué castigo recibe quien no se da cuenta de que su propio acólito es un traidor?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, ¿qué castigo recibe quien no se da cuenta de que su propio acólito es un traidor?».

languages.text: « Heinrix, quel châtiment réserve-t-on à une personne qui n'a pas été capable de percevoir que son acolyte était en réalité un traître ? »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, quel châtiment réserve-t-on à une personne qui n'a pas été capable de percevoir que son acolyte était en réalité un traître ? »

languages.text: "Heinrix, welche Strafe steht darauf, nicht zu erkennen, dass die eigene Akolythin eine Verräterin war?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, welche Strafe steht darauf, nicht zu erkennen, dass die eigene Akolythin eine Verräterin war?"

languages.text: 「ハインリックス、自分のアコライトが裏切り者だと気づかなかった者には、どんな罰が待っている？」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、自分のアコライトが裏切り者だと気づかなかった者には、どんな罰が待っている？」

languages.text: "Heinrix, kendi havarisinin bir hain olduğunu anlayamayanlara nasıl bir ceza verilir?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, what punishment awaits him who failed to realise his own acolyte was a traitor?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, kendi havarisinin bir hain olduğunu anlayamayanlara nasıl bir ceza verilir?"
